sys_app_scan_payload.serialized_record:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_transform"><sys_ux_data_broker_transform action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><acl_failure_result/><api_name>!!!scope_name!!!.Inventory Tracker Breadcrumb Transform</api_name><description/><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Inventory Tracker Breadcrumb Transform</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props>[
   {
      "name":"inventoryControlResult",
      "label":"Inventory Controll Result",
      "description":"Result of Lookup Record Query on Inventory Controll Record",
      "readOnly":false,
      "fieldType":"object",
      "mandatory":true,
      "defaultValue":{
         
      }
   }
]</props><required_translations>[{"message":"Result of Lookup Record Query on Inventory Controll Record","comment":""},{"message":"Inventory Controll Result","comment":""}]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform(input) {
    return [{
        label: 'Home',
        href: '/now/inventory-tracker/portal/home'
    }, {
        label: gs.getMessage('{0}', input.inventoryControlResult.name.displayValue),
    }];
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_transform</sys_class_name><sys_created_by/><sys_created_on/><sys_id>!!!starter_experience_0_acl!!!</sys_id><sys_mod_count/><sys_name/><sys_package display_value="">!!!app_sys_id!!!</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="">!!!app_sys_id!!!</sys_scope><sys_update_name/><sys_updated_by/><sys_updated_on/></sys_ux_data_broker_transform><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=null"/></record_update>
